description: This header file declares internal API functions for the Bbhm UDP Echo server object in the Broadband Home Manager Model. It includes function prototypes for starting, stopping, engaging, canceling, retrieving results, and configuration management related to the UDP echo diagnostic component.
external_files: ANSC_STATUS (likely defined elsewhere, possibly in a common include)

methods.name: BbhmUdpechoEngage
methods.description: Engages the UDP echo component, likely initializing and starting the server.

methods.name: BbhmUdpechoCancel
methods.description: Cancels or stops the UDP echo server activity.

methods.name: BbhmUdpechoStartDiag
methods.description: Starts the diagnostics process for the UDP echo server.

methods.name: BbhmUdpechoGetResult
methods.description: Returns a handle to the current diagnostic result.

methods.name: BbhmUdpechoRetrieveResult
methods.description: Retrieves the latest diagnostic result into internal storage.

methods.name: BbhmUdpechoGetConfig
methods.description: Retrieves the current configuration for the UDP echo server.

methods.name: BbhmUdpechoSetConfig
methods.description: Sets the configuration for the UDP echo server using provided diagnostic info.
